column1: Considering  all  these  aspects,  we  find  no  justification  to  interfere  with  the  sentence
handed down by the Learned High Court Judge on 16.07.2024.

T
he Sentence is backdated to the date of conviction, namely 16.07.2014.

F
urthermore,  we  make  no  change  in  the  fine  and  the  compensation  imposed  on  the

T
he Registrar of this court is directed to send this judgment to the High Court of Puttalam
JUDGE OF THE COURT OF APPEAL
JUDGE OF THE COURT OF APPEAL
